sub_fields.label: Enqueue Bootstrap Bundle
sub_fields.name: use_bootstrap_bundle
sub_fields.instructions: Whether to load custom css or the full bootstrap bundle

sub_fields.label: Default Grid System
sub_fields.name: default_grid_system
sub_fields.instructions: Whether to use flex or grid for the main layout grid system (bootstrap supports both)

sub_fields.label: Box Model Sizing
sub_fields.name: box_model_sizing
sub_fields.instructions: Additional settings for margins, paddings and position attributes. Note: These settings are not designed to replace module styles. Any sections / rows / columns / modules that use these settings will retain their existing value if these values are updated.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Additional settings for width, min-width and max-width attributes. Note: These settings are not designed to replace module styles. Any sections / rows / columns / modules that use these settings will retain their existing value if these values are updated.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Additional settings for height, min-height and max-height attributes. Note: These settings are not designed to replace module styles. Any sections / rows / columns / modules that use these settings will retain their existing value if these values are updated.

fields.label: Typography
fields.name: buildystrap_typography
fields.instructions: Fonts should be added under _typography.scss and uploaded to /dist/fonts/

sub_fields.label: Body Font
sub_fields.name: body_font
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the font name exactly as it is in CSS (including spaces / casing if applicable)

sub_fields.label: Heading Font
sub_fields.name: heading_font
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the font name exactly as it is in CSS (including spaces / casing if applicable)

sub_fields.label: Font Name
sub_fields.name: value
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the font name exactly as it is in CSS (including spaces / casing if applicable)

fields.label: Header Snippets
fields.name: buildystrap_header_snippets
fields.instructions: These snippets will be added right before the closing head tag.

fields.label: Body Snippets
fields.name: buildystrap_body_snippets
fields.instructions: These snippets will be added right after the opening body tag.

fields.label: Footer Snippets
fields.name: buildystrap_footer_snippets
fields.instructions: These snippets will be added right before the closing body tag.
